name: The Man (mothballers)
description:
"He does it! Press the up arrow to move. Use the arrow keys to turn him. Don't touch any of the Beings!"

The Man is the first entry into the "The Man" game series, and moreso, my very first Scratch project, ever. So, yes, it'd be wise not to expect much from it.

The Man 1 is an endless action-like game where you simply dodge four entities (called the Angry Guys) to survive.

Soundtrack  by yamburger
